A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Totally inept and incompetent film-making. How such a ridiculous and nonsensical script ever got the green light is beyond me. As a movie\, it's utter garbage; as a STAR WARS movie\, it's an abomination. Do yourself a favor and avoid this tripe. In fact\, you would be doing yourself a huge favor by avoiding everything produced by Hollywood\, turning off the TV\, and reading books instead.
